title: When is Robert Sugden’s last episode in Emmerdale?
text:
Oh, our hearts… (Picture: ITV)

Our Robert Sugden’s (Ryan Hawley) time on Emmerdale is drawing to a close.

We’ve known for quite some time that actor Ryan’s days on the soap were numbered, as he announced his impending exit earlier this year.

As we steel ourselves to say goodbye to dear Robron, here’s what we know about how much longer Robert will be appearing on the soap.

When is Robert’s last episode in Emmerdale?

We don’t yet know when Robert’s final episode will air, but we know it’s drawing close.

In recent scenes, Robert and his husband Aaron (Dany Miller) tried to go on the run after they learned that vile rapist Lee (Kris Mochrie) had died of injuries that Robert had inflicted on him.

Rather than face a murder charge and what would very likely be a lengthy prison sentence as a result, Robert and Aaron fled the village.

However Aaron’s plans to abscond with his husband were scuppered in tear-jerking scenes last night when, in an effort to save Aaron from a life on the run, Robert turned himself in to the police.

In scenes tonight, a distraught Aaron will try come to terms with Robert’s decision and attempt to contact his love.

On being part of the Emmerdale cast, actor Ryan said: ‘I will miss the show massively, it has been a huge part of my life for the last few years. I love working here, I love the people that I work with and it’s going to be very emotional leaving.’

Parting is indeed such sweet sorrow…

Emmerdale continues on Friday 18th October at 7pm on ITV.
